Hi there!


I'm installing Globin, following the Installation Guide instructions.


I'm on the step 2 A, compiling the ALVAR 1.2 solution(and I tried with 1.3 too). I checked the paths to the libraries and it's all right.


When I compile I get this error:
Error 1 fatal error LNK1181: cannot open input file 'alvar120.lib' ALVARWrapper1.2 ALVARWrapper1.2


Some help to solve this issue?

If the path is correct, then it should find the .lib files. Make sure the directory path you indicated actually has the right libraries.

Ohan

Hi ohanoda, thanks to reply.

File "alvar120.lib" should be on my hard drive, before compiling? or it's created at the time of compilation?

Excuse my ignorance but I'm learning step by step!

thanks

in ALVARWrapper1.3.sln i used these "Additional Include Directories" for C/C++:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Alvar 1.3.0\include\pro";"C:\Program Files (x86)\Alvar 1.3.0\include\platform";"C:\Program Files (x86)\Alvar 1.3.0\include";"C:\Program Files (x86)\OpenCV\cv\include";"C:\Program Files (x86)\OpenCV\cxcore\include

and these "Additional Library Directories" for Linker:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\OpenCV\lib";"C:\Program Files (x86)\Alvar 1.3.0\bin\msvc90"

make sure you specify correct paths!!

try it.

or i can send you the ALVARWrapper.dll if you still can't get it right.

good luck!
